thread.title: 76ers' Joel Embiid shoots down 'WAGs' star Olivia Pierson on Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: 76ers' Joel Embiid shoots down 'WAGs' star Olivia Pierson on Valentine's Day

author: Jordan Heck (jordan.heck@performgroup.com)
title: 76ers' Joel Embiid shoots down 'WAGs' star Olivia Pierson on Valentine's Day
text:
February 15, 2017 8:24am EST February 15, 2017 8:24am EST Basketball, NBA, News, English The 76ers big man says their relationship is 'fake news.' Joel Embiid (Getty Images) 
Updated at 8:24 a.m. ET 
Updated at 8:24 a.m. ET 
Joel Embiid had an interesting Valentine's Day. 
The drama started early when reality TV starÂ Olivia Pierson, featured on E!'s 'WAGs', posted a photo on Instagram with the 76ers big man, lying shirtless in bed next to her. She added a caption that made it pretty clear they were dating as she wished him a happy Valentine's Day. 
MORE: Magic, Raptors both winners in Serge Ibaka trade 
The photo got attention as no one knew the couple were dating. Many thought Embiid was still chasing after Rihanna or his unknown celebrity crush.Â 
While Pierson appears to be under the belief they're dating, Embiid responded pretty strongly. He added a comment to her post saying, "Old news, I'm not trusting this process," and he also uploaded the photo to Instagram Stories with the hashtag "Fake News." 
Both Pierson and Embiid deleted their posts, so who knows what's really going on here. Watch This
